Blog.post: This is my "blog." i have no idea what it is, or what its purpose is but i thought i'd check it out cuz my friend had it on her profile. Its saturday...only 13 more days left til summer...hallelujah.

TrixR4kidz0 : but like right now i feel so... like fluffy TrixR4kidz0 : i feel fluffy TrixR4kidz0 : fluffy fluffy fluffy Cheeriobri23 : im..fluffy Cheeriobri23 : like....i seriously Cheeriobri23 : like feel...fluffy Carmelkayla : fluffy Carmelkayla : dont u love it when u feel like that I feel fluffy.... ....sheesh....

...just want to make that clear. Anyway life is crazy. maybe you've noticed. When i wanted love, it screwed me over...then when i didnt want love, it screwed me over. kinda lame huh? i think im cursed. And, i guess im not the only one... but i gotta tell you, i wasnt expecting him. not at all. i was already head over heels for someone else--and was just picking myself up from that--when i ran into him. 's funny how that happens... i hope he knows that i dont hate him. that telling him no was hard. that after i gave him that note i sat on the ground with my head in my hands, feeling so incredibly small. i hope you know, kid...

Ive decided i want to be a cat. lol. (Dont ask.) okay...well today was a little more eventful that latley i guess. Went to the movies with alex...and then ran to rehearsal right after. Yah, i made quite an entrance. i was 10 minutes late and they were in the middle of singing the opening number. So i walk through the big wooden doors, and i try to close them as slow as possible, but these doors arent alligned properly, so they always bang. And it decided to BANG right after the last note of the song. So everyone stares at me...and im just standing there like "crap that was loud" then this little girl in the show yells "your LATE" haha sheesh, that was fun.

GRRRR. Alex...if you ever call me at 2:30 in the morning again without probable cause --i will hurt you! or ill send my brothers to hurt you, cuz i dont think i'd be capable of doing any damage. lol. i mean, c'mon tho. imagine with me now.(those of you with bad imaginations...skip to the next paragraph) going to bed at 1 o'clock--knowing you've gotta be up at 8 am to get ready for church. think in my head "ok, well ill get 7 hours of sleep--thats not too bad." so i fall asleep in about a half hour--only cuz im crazily tired. Then, i hear this faint "bleep" and then start hearing the rest of whatever my ring tone is called. who knows what it is...cuz i have one of those retarded old phones with classic ringtones that EVERY business person has. EW. But yah, alex you're soo....uh...MUR! (haha...good times) Kayla has stolen my word. SHEESH, kayla. maybe ill have to send my brothers to beat you up too!!! im listening to coheed and cambria--who i love--much thanks to sean. (bye bye beautiful, dont bother to write...hehe)

Cheeriobri23 : brian!! tobiasthebutler : BRI!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! tobiasthebutler : how are you Cheeriobri23 : im ok, how are u? tobiasthebutler : i'm moderate i guess i feel moderate too, brian. lol. today was pretty dull. i got to such a high point of complete boredom i actually found the carpet in my room (a mighty feit) and curled my hair (which looked...different). Great fun.
Pikekid2 : life is a gift and its fantastic gotta love ya, alex.

Its BrAnDoNs 18th BiRtHdAy today! look at me smile. ok well yesterday was fun. went to white rock with alex and kayla (sorry your second, kay...its alphabetical haha) oh, and rodney came too. Carmelkayla : and rodney Cheeriobri23 : rodney...is he her bf? Cheeriobri23 : or your step dad? Yah, that was pretty halarious. right....so now im sitting here listening to the 18 YeAr oLd BrAnDoN play his guitar....i think he missed it this weekend cuz his friend borrowed it. k i need to go figure out how to get sam a ride to rehearsal tonight....fun
Cheeriobri23 (7:30:25 PM): im so glad we're just friends yah...how hypocritical can i get? wow...funny.

Wow im so excited! I can use different fonts and colors. (its the little things in life...) You know what bugs me? when people say "we're just friends." I mean, would you really say, "oh, hes just my boyfriend." makes it sound insignificant doesnt it? And i dunno about you all, but my friends (aside from my family) are the most important people in my life. They dont deserve to be " just " anything. right? Ne marches pas derrière, je ne vous mènerai pas. Ne marches pas devant, je ne vous suivrai pas Marchez à côté de moi et soyez mon ami. -Albert Camus

"It's okay to be angry and never let go It only gets harder the more that you know When you get lonely if no one's around You know that I'll catch you when you're falling down We came together but you left alone And I know how it feels to walk out on your own Maybe someday I will see you again And you'll look me in my eyes and call me your friend" -Yellowcard, "Empty Appartment"

im gonna kill my brother. i get up at 8:00 on a sunday morning and rush to get ready for church, right? When its time to go, my brother is out sleeping in his caceda (sue me cause i spelled that wrong). So im totally awake now, my hair still wet from the shower, in a church skirt and all at 9 in the morning and im not even going to church cause i cant exactly drive myself there (9 more months!!). yah that was a brilliant start to the day. then my mom gets home from her rendez-vous with my dad last night. she made us cookies...a slama sunday tradition. if you've never had chocolate chip cookies with oatmeal, download the recipe right now and go make some.im dead serious. THEY'RE SOOOOOO GOOD!

switchfoot. kaes dad thinks its a cuss word...but, yah, way awesome band. So...today was kinda blah. rehearsals. tv. food. oh, and then tonight my mom goes out to dinner with my dad ...and randomly calls like 20 minutes ago to say that she won't be home til tomorrow afternoon. I should pull that one on her sometime. ha, that'd be fun.... Kae: okay, so you know how when you're jumping of a cliff? Bri: yah..? Kae: ok well...this one time... (wow...i burned 500 calories laughing about that one)

So today my mom decides i cant blast my story of the year music. She classifys it as "screamy meemee music." sheesh. she went to go bring lunch to my dad at work. so im blasting it :) hmm i have a physical today. joy. i already had a dentist appt. this week, i mean, what are they trying to do to me? i have to get my wisdom teeth out. kinda funny, cause brandon is getting them out the same month as me and hes, what, 3 years older than me? yah he's gonna be 18 in about a week here. should probably get him a present...

Dont you love the way your hair feels after you get it cut? its all soft. yay. uhh..so besides getting my hair chopped off, i went to the ortho today, and had lunch with my madre at fresh choice. Then, rehearsal as usual--cept my mom was there to watch the little kids--so it was a little interesting. I hadnt told her about costya yet--so i had to totally keep my guard up. (sorry about that costya lol). But she found out, and she actually totally approves which is way awesome. She likes ya, costya. :) Anywho....i dont have rehearsal tomorrow or saturday! talk about bored bri. oh well. well, actually i think i might go see "Hello, Dolly!" at the Western Stage, cuz i have a friend in it. Anyone wanna come with me?

Today was pretty much a gigantic yawn. Got up at 10 to watch a little tv, hung out at home all day, and then went to rehearsal. rehearsal wasnt too bad though. I got attacked by a group of little girls, and totally screwed up in this one scene--oh, and then sam decides that im not giving him enough attention so he goes and trambles on my script, and now its a wrinkled mess. sheesh thanks, sam. (happy now? ur in my blog)....but other than that it went well. i got to hear costya talk to his gramma in russian!!! good times.... So, im getting my wisdom teeth out in a couple weeks here. should be a thrilling experience. Im actually looking forward to the whole being pushed in a wheelchair thing. the puffy cheeks--not so much. oh well, im sure ill brighten a few peoples day with my chipmunk cheeks. haha thats a great name... "chipmunk cheeks"...kinda hard to say without sounding like an idiot though. Yah, you know you just said it outloud to see how it would sound...lol. (Ha, making this post was an adventure, haha, only kayla understands) no one ever leaves me comments...kinda sad. so click the thing that says "_ comments" and leave me one!
KAE IS HOME! yaaay! (thats enough excitment to fill one entry, id say)
